solution_line_template: With the price of each doll at ${original_doll_price}, this means he has saved a total of {dolls_he_can_buy} * {original_doll_price} = $<<{dolls_he_can_buy}*{original_doll_price}={total_savings}>>{total_savings}.

When the price is lowered to ${discounted_doll_price} each, he can now purchase {total_savings} / {discounted_doll_price} = <<{total_savings}/{discounted_doll_price}={dolls_can_buy_now}>>{dolls_can_buy_now} dolls.
